experience.description: Lead a team of engineers delivering scalable PHP services. Set architecture standards, perform code reviews, and coordinate DevOps automation to ensure smooth releases.
responsibilities: Manage a team of developers and coordinate sprint planning.
Review code and enforce best practices for maintainable PHP.
Architect RESTful APIs and system integrations.
Drive automation and deployment processes.

experience.description: Designed and implemented complex backend features. Mentored teammates, contributed to infrastructure improvements, and collaborated on system design and integrations.
responsibilities: Build and optimize backend services.
Lead architecture discussions and integrations.
Mentor developers through code reviews and pair programming.
Ensure reliable deployments using Docker and Kubernetes.

experience.description: In this leadership role, I was responsible for driving end-to-end automation initiatives, from strategic planning to successful delivery. I led and mentored a team of automation developers, ensuring high standards in solution design, development, and deployment. Working closely with cross-functional business stakeholders, I translated complex requirements into scalable automation strategies that aligned with organizational goals. I defined project scopes and timelines, monitored progress, and ensured timely delivery with measurable impact. Additionally, I maintained detailed documentation (PDDs, SDDs, design specs), collaborated with QA teams for solution validation, and resolved technical challenges to ensure a smooth and efficient automation rollout.
responsibilities: Lead and mentor a team of Automation developers, providing guidance and support in executing automation projects
Design, develop, and implement Automation solutions using industry-leading tools and technologies
Ensure the successful deployment of automated processes, meeting quality and efficiency standards
Analyze existing business processes to identify opportunities for automation and improvement
Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and define automation objectives
Define project scope, objectives, and timelines for Automation initiatives
Track and report on the progress of Automation projects, ensuring they align with organizational goals
Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for Automation processes, including design specifications, PDD, and SDD
Collaborate with quality assurance teams to validate Automation solutions
Resolve technical issues and challenges related to Automation implementation

experience.description: In this role, I served as a strategic automation consultant, leading initiatives from process discovery to solution delivery. I facilitated workshops with client SMEs to assess process suitability, identify automation opportunities, and eliminate blockers. I designed and delivered scalable RPA solutions, contributed to prototypes and proof of concepts, and acted as the main technical point of contact for configuration issues. My work extended to building reusable components, supporting Agile transformations, and helping establish Automation Centers of Excellence. I also played a key role in business analysis, system design, and change management—bridging the gap between business needs and technical execution to drive impactful automation outcomes.
responsibilities: Running workshops with client SMEs to understand the end-to-end process while identifying any automation blockers and the suitability of the process for automation
Delivering RPA solutions and being the first point of contact in case of any configuration issues for the team
Contributing to RPA prototypes and Proofs of Concept
Articulating the vision and value proposition to senior-level clients regarding process and automation transformation
Identification and assessment of potential processes for RPA

Supporting the development of an Automation Center of Excellence to align with clientʼs strategic priorities, develop performance/risk reporting, and support the transition to a new service delivery model (e.g., Agile)
Designing, building, developing, and testing new digital products along with efficient reusable components, scripts, and frameworks
Working on business analysis, system design, business process re-engineering, and change management

experience.description: As an RPA Developer at Arab Bank, I led the full lifecycle of automation projects—from requirement gathering and feasibility analysis to development, deployment, and post-production support. Working closely with business stakeholders, I translated complex processes into efficient automated workflows. I also managed live environments, handled exception monitoring, and ensured the stability and scalability of RPA solutions across the organization.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and test automation workflows
Deploy RPA components
Work directly with stakeholders to capture business requirements and translate them into technical specifications
Support deployments and troubleshoot production issues
Run processes, analyze process logs
Administrate the live environment daily
Manage live technical environments on a daily basis
Manage and investigate exceptions
Perform feasibility checks on the applications used and present demos by creating high-level POCs
Prepare SDD and PDD based on client requirements and obtain approval before development phase

experience.description: As an Application Specialist at Arab Bank in Dubai, I played a key role in supporting and enhancing banking systems, particularly in the lending domain. I worked closely with IT and business teams to ensure the smooth operation of core applications, handled troubleshooting, and provided day-to-day technical support to various business units.
responsibilities: Troubleshooting system and network problems and diagnosing and solving hardware or software faults.
Support Banking Lending System.
Providing Software application support under the supervision of the senior engineers.
Ensuring effective front-end and back-end Functionality of applications.

experience.description: During my time at Arab Bank, I contributed to key software development projects that supported core banking operations. My role focused on building and maintaining robust applications and backend services that improved efficiency and supported business growth.
responsibilities: Analyze, design, develop and test software's that meet business needs
Develop and maintain Bank Applications
Develop and maintain windows services.
Use document management system to process business documents.
